item.description:
We would love to have everyone over to our house in Concord on a Sunday afternoon for vegan "ice cream" and treats! Debrah's Natural Gourmet is having a sale on some vegan icecreams during the month of August so it would be easy to swing by and pick up your favorite flavor on their way over. We will make a flavor not sold in stores but super yummy - like basil or garahm masala or persian icecream. Our favorite base is coconut milk and agave nectar. :-)

 

We really enjoyed the social last year and hope to see everyone again!
item.name: Vegan Ice Cream Social
